overview:
Jon Miller is the Vice President of Content Delivery at GridNetworks. He has 15 years of experience in technology development and operations in both startup companies and established enterprises. Most recently he was Senior Director of Technology Development for Getty Images where he led software development, QA, and program management teams.

As an early employee of Internap Network Services Jon built and led teams responsible for core network design, ongoing engineering, and operations. He also led research and development of new service offerings to complement the optimized IP network service.

Additionally Jon’s background includes IT and operations roles in established enterprises such as Keane and Washington Mutual as well as the early stages of Real Networks and Intermind.

via: GridNetworks
